page.title: 19SHOPPING FACILITIES
page.content: West Calder has over 35 shops.They include 2 banks,2 cafes,a paper shop,a chip shop,a supermarket,a pet shop,a grocer,a bookmaker,2 wool shops,2 butchers,a carpet shop and a post office.West Calder also has over 5 public houses,3 hairdressers,a chemist,2 electrical shops and a coffee shop. The council have recently reopened the old bakery which is being changed into work spaces for small businesses.One of these small businesses is called Cinders it is owned and run by Audry Grindly who makes dresses,suites and wedding dresses.There are two new shops one is called Articrafts which sells a wide range of hand made craft items the other is an electrical shop.
